name: KickBack: The Real Work Booklet
2:22 Booklet - PDF Version
description: Perform routines with PEZ dispensers, lip balm, board game pieces, business cards, playing cards, salt shakers, CDs, napkins, and gummy worms. Pez-A-Matic- Magically load a PEZ dispenser. EXTREMELY VISUAL! I.D. Marking System- This isn’t your grandfather’s daub. SLAY YOUR FELLOW MAGI at the next meeting! TransMentally Challenged- As seen in the January 2002 MAGIC Magazine. FOR THE FIRST TIME, learn the patter and presentation that ties it all together! Moments- A perfect routine to use that incorporates your business cards. Enjoy the EMOTIONAL STORYLINE that makes this a true reputation-maker! Salt, Coin, Table- A new twist on the old magical effect of making a salt shaker penetrate the table. CRAZY KICKER ENDING! Name That Tune- A randomly selected song on a CD is correctly predicted. This is one of the HIGHLIGHTS at Ryan’s lectures, was performed at the prestigous F.F.F.F. Convention! License To Be Mental- The performer reveals the spectator’s license plate number by reading the spectator’s mind. Make your audience’s JAWS DROP! Pretty Face- An interesting effect that starts off humorous, but then turns gruesome. Performed with EVERYDAY OBJECTS!
